text: Glauco Sansovini (20 May 1938 – 21 May 2019) was a Sammarinese politician and one of the Captains Regent of San Marino together with Marco Conti for the semester from 1 April 2010 to 1 October 2010.Rulers.org - April 2010 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:People from Rocca San Casciano Category:Captains Regent of San Marino Category:Members of the Grand and General Council Category:Sammarinese National Alliance politicians Category:Sammarinese men
title: Glauco Sansovini
